content.question: Which of the following best describes a terrestrial ecosystem that will have the highest net primary productivity?

choices.label: Warm temperatures, high rainfall, and consistent sunlight
Hot temperatures, low rainfall, and consistent sunlight
Cold temperatures, high rainfall, and inconsistent sunlight
Warm temperatures, low rainfall, and inconsistent sunlight

content.answer: Warm temperatures, high rainfall, and consistent sunlight

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
